NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Land and Demand or the cell corresponding to Property Management and Interest Rates?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Land} and {Demand} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Commercial and Inventory or the cell corresponding to Industrial and Inventory?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Commercial} and {Inventory} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.45 to 0.63?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Land, Age), (Mortgages, Demand), (Land, Inventory), (Land, Location)}.
